standard.description: Standards for correctly implementing Redwood patterns

test.test_name: Contextual Info regions should be configured correctly
test.query_clob:
select case when aapr.template not in ('No Template', 'Blank with Attributes')
            then 'N'
            when aapr.display_position != 'Contextual Info'
            then 'N'
            when aapr.report_template != 'Contextual Info (Row)'
            then 'N'
            when aap.page_template in ('AO Foldout (Horizontal Header)','Foldout (Horizontal Header)')
            then case when aapr.component_template_options not like '%js-ConveyorBelt%'
                      then 'N'
                      when aapr.component_template_options not like '%rw-ContextualInfo--horizontal%'
                      then 'N'
                      when aapr.component_template_options not like '%rw-ContextualInfo--labelInline%'
                      then 'N'
                      when aapr.component_template_options not like '%rw-Report--hideNoPagination%'
                      then 'N'
                      else 'Y'
                      end
            when aap.page_template in ('AO Foldout (Vertical Header)','Foldout (Vertical Header)','Item Overview','AO Item Overview','Item Overview')
            then case when aapr.component_template_options not like '%rw-ContextualInfo--vertical%'
                      then 'N'
                      when aapr.component_template_options not like '%rw-ContextualInfo--labelStacked%'
                      then 'N'
                      when aapr.component_template_options not like '%rw-Report--hideNoPagination%'
                      then 'N'
                      else 'Y'
                      end
            when aap.page_template in ('AO General Overview','General Overview','Generic')
            then case when aapr.component_template_options not like '%rw-Report--hideNoPagination%'
                      then 'N'
                      else 'Y'
                      end
            else 'Y'
            end pass_yn,                          
       aapr.application_id, 
       aapr.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapr.last_updated_by,
       aapr.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Region `%0` (app %1, page %2) is misconfigured (template `%3`, display position `%4`, template options `%5`, report template `%6`, page template `%7`', 
        p0 => aapr.region_name, 
        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id,
        p3 => aapr.template,
        p4 => aapr.display_position,
        p5 => aapr.component_template_options,
        p6 => aapr.report_template,
        p7 => aap.page_template) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Region `%0` (app %1, page %2) is misconfigured', 
        p0 => aapr.region_name, 
        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id) issue_title,
       aapr.region_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aapr.region_name,
       aapr.template,
       aapr.display_position,
       aapr.source_type,
       aapr.component_template_options,
       aapr.report_template,
       aa.theme_number,
       aap.page_template,
			 aapr.workspace
from apex_application_page_regions aapr
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapr.page_id and aap.application_id = aapr.application_id
inner join apex_applications aa on aa.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = aapr.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapr.application_id
where aapr.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and aa.theme_number = 1000
and aapr.region_name = 'Contextual Info'
and aapr.source_type = 'Report'
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
test.explanation:
The Contextual Info Classic Report should be:

1.  inside the `Contextual info`  display position
2.  with a template of `none`  or `Blank with Attributes`
3.  with a report template of `Contextual Info (Row)`

### Page template considerations

### `Foldout (Horizontal Header)`

1.  Check `Conveyor Belt`
2.  Set Layout to `Horizontal`
3.  Set Label to `Inline`
4.  Set Pagination Display to `Hide when all rows displayed`

### `Foldout (Vertical Header)` / `Item Overview`

1.  Set Layout to `Vertical`
2.  Set Label to `Stacked`
3.  Set Pagination Display to `Hide when all rows displayed`

### `General Overview` / `Generic`

1.  Set Pagination Display to `Hide when all rows displayed`
test.fix: Correct the display position, template, report template or template options
